verses.roman:
sarvatra sthāpaya prabhu vaiṣṇava-siddhānte
prabhura siddhānta keha nā pāre khaṇḍite

synonyms: sarvatra—everywhere; sthāpaya—establishes; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vaiṣṇava-siddhānte—the conclusion of the Vaiṣṇavas; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; siddhānta—conclusion; keha—anyone; nā pāre—is not able; khaṇḍite—to defy.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu established the devotional cult everywhere. No one could defeat Him.
